description:
The students are taking a trip to a summit for two days. Amu at first doesn`t want to go, but thinks about the things she`ll be able to do with Tadase and changes her mind. It turns out one of the Chairmen is Kairi! Tension builds on the trip and Kairi and Amu get into a small fight.  As a storm comes in putting Amu and Tadase and another child in danger, will Kairi make it there in time to save them?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kewashiki Makoto no Michi! Kairi Futatabi!
Tough Road of Integrity! Kairi Returns!
険しき誠の道! 海里再び!
